fields.Title: Repack Food Process: To-Be Workshop Report
fields.Outlet (if applicable): Submitted to process leads and leadership of The Idaho Foodbank
fields.Description/Abstract:
This deliverable was one of several created for a process reengineering effort with The Idaho Foodbank. This technical report summarizes the work of the 8/7/20 To-Be workshop to create a map of the Repack Food process. The report included the following contents:
1.  Introduction
2. Stakeholders and Success Criteria
3. Takeaways
4. Big Ideas—Major Initiatives Developed In the To-Be Session
     a. Provide adequate training and cross training
     b. Increase staffing
     d. Other ideas
5. Major Process Characteristics and Controls that Guide Crucial Activities
     a. Repack Process Characteristics
     b. Process Controls
6. To-Be Process Diagrams and Detail Tables
     a. Level 1 Process Map: Overall Repack Model
     b. Level 2 Diagrams
     c. Plan Repacking (Friday Meeting & Before Shifts Begin)
     d. Prepare Volunteer Activity (Pre-Shift)
     e. Train Volunteers (During Shift)
     f. Repack Product  (During Shift)
     g. Wrap Up Repacked Product (During Shift)
     h. Clean/Sanitize (Post-Shift)
APPENDIX
     a. To-Be Workshop: Master Process-Disconnects-Solutions-Implementation Notes Table
     b. Shift View of Level 1 High Level Repack Process
